text: Rule-out bipolar disorder, given the history of hypomanic symptoms, and family history of bipolar disorder.

text: The patient had only a partial response to the current dose of light therapy.Treatment: 1) Will increase light therapy duration to 60 minutes every morning, from a 10,000 lux light box.
